      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameClusterServer
      The GameClusterServer class contains an implementation of the GameServer interface.
      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer that return GameServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameServer GameClusterServer.getMaster()
      This method simply asks this server who it believes to be the current master.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Hashtable<java.util.UUID,GameServer> GameClusterServer.getPeers()
      Ask the server for a Hashtable of the peer servers it knows about.
      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer with parameters of type GameServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameClusterServer.addPeer(java.util.UUID id, GameServer server)
      When a new server joins the system, it should be added to all slaves' peer lists.
      boolean GameClusterServer.checkServer(GameServer s)
      Takes in a reference to a server s and pings it.
      boolean GameClusterServer.closeLeaderElection(java.util.UUID id, GameServer newLeader)
      In closing the leader election protocol, this server updates who it believes is the master and prints out the UUID of that new master.
      boolean GameClusterServer.setMaster(GameServer newMaster)
      This method is used to tell this server who the master is now.
      Method parameters in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer with type arguments of type GameServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameClusterServer.setPeers(java.util.Hashtable<java.util.UUID,GameServer> peers)
      This method is called to inform a server of the peers available in the system.
